Name: Britney Vaz
Description:
Britney was an entrepreneur and businesswoman who ran her own bar ("Bar da Britney", or "Britney's Bar").

She was shot at the door of her own bar in the early hours of 3rd June 2018. Police were called by witnesses who heard gunshots, but unfortunately she died at the scene.

> A dear person who would not have the courage to do bad to any animal, I had many years of friendship with Britney and know her how good her heart was. I can only hope that justice will be done, that the criminals will pay what they must pay, for a life in truth has no pressure or even a penalty which can absolve them of the terrible act which they have committed.
> 
> Rest in peace, my dear friend. You will forever stay in my memory and how important you were to my daughter. I love you.
    -- Polyana

Britney's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/britney.vaz.7.

Name: Kamylla Roberta
Description:
Kamylla was found beaten to death with an iron bar in her home in the north of Santa Catarina Island. She had only moved there a month earlier.

Police arrested a suspect the following month.

Kamylla's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/kamylla.roberta.39.

> A reporter spoke to the friend who found her dead on the floor of the apartment she had moved to a few days ago.
> 
> "I missed her on Thursday because she had not answered my messages since the day before, and she never did that. I was worried so I went into the building, I talked to the owner of the apartment, who took the key and when we opened the door, Kamylla was on the floor, already dead. She was dating recently, but I did not know him. I do not know why they did this to her, it was a hateful crime", they said.


In October 2021 Júnior Everton Menegildo was convicted of femicide and sentenced to 14 years, 10 months and 10 days in prison.

> The Capital Jury Court unanimously sentenced the defendant Júnior Everton Menegildo to 14 years, 11 months and 10 days in prison this week, accused of the violent murder of transsexual Kamylla Roberta ([deadname]) in the north of the island.
>
> In the indictment, the Attorney André Otávio Mello acted, who upheld a thesis unpublished in Santa Catarina: that the defendant had also committed the crime of femicide, due to the fact that he lived with the “woman” murdered using an iron bar while she slept. In addition to the violence, he fled with the victim's car to Itapema, where he was arrested four days later.
>
> The Judgment Council accepted the Public Ministry's thesis that the victim had the female gender as an identity and unanimously condemned the defendant for the practice of doubly qualified homicide. Prosecutor André Otávio highlighted: "The law that guarantees greater protection to women does not only refer to the biological sex, but also covers every human being who considers herself to be female." He invoked violence against women, citing the Federal Constitution in the week in which it completed 33 years since its enactment.

IBTE & G1 Santa Catarina, 07.06.2018

Name: J. G. Romero Ortiz
Description:
J.'s body was found inside a plastic bag buried in the garden of a residence on 14th June. She had been reported missing on 3rd June.

They had been shot. Their partner is suspected of being responsible for the crime.

*Editor's Note: This is one of those cases whether the gender identity of the victim is not obvious. We have no photos, and the news reports refer to the victim as male. The only clue that the victim may have been trans is that one report states that the body was "a man dressed as a woman". They could have been (for example) a crossdresser, genderfluid, genderqueer, nonbinary, or a trans woman - without more information we have no way of knowing.*

Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Siglo Mexico,  10.06.2018

Name: Jessica Mattos
Description:
Jessica's body was found by her sister with her head trapped in a window of an abandoned house at Rua Três, in Battisti neighborhood. She died by asphyxiation.

According to relatives, she slept in the abandoned house and used the window to get in and out of the property. As such her death was probably accidental, but also a result of the circumstances she found herself in. Grupo Gay da Bahia (who record deaths of LGBTQ+ people in Brazil) list her cause of death as "cultural transphobia".

Her Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/jessicamattos.mattos.3.

Name: Diamond Stephens
Description:
Diamond was found dead inside a crashed van in Meridian, Mississippi (USA) on 18th June 2018. She had been shot in the back of the head.

According to local media, family members said that she was driving home to get ready for work when she was killed.

She was not identified as transgender until late the following month.

> The victim in a June shooting death in Meridian, Mississippi, has been identified as 39-year-old Diamond Stephens, a transgender woman of color. Initial reports in local media misgendered Stephens, but trans activists have confirmed Stephens was trans and she used female pronouns on her social media profiles.
> 
> According to local outlet WTOK, authorities were called to the scene of a van crash on the evening of June 18. Police discovered Stephens fatally shot inside the vehicle.

The Advocate and WTOK, 19.06.2018

She died in hospital after undergoing 12 hours of surgery in an attempt to save her life.

Three days earlier she had shared video footage of a thief who had stolen her motorbike. It is not known whether he was connected with her death.

Name: Chloe Sagal
Description:
Chloe died by suicide in a park in downtown Portland.

> "Chloe was brilliant and rarely got a chance to show it," friend AJ Luxton said in an email. "She created enchanting video games, she built things, she volunteered with Habitat for Humanity after Hurricane Katrina, she taught herself to read despite severe dyslexia."
> 
> Sagal was a game developer and artist who struggled with mental illness for many years. Her friends say she loved dogs, forged authentic weapons and made haunting music when she was able to. They say she was proud of her Romani heritage and an active socialist.
> 
> They also say she was the target of an online bullying campaign that derailed her.
> 
> She was an indie game developer know for creating the game Homesick. And in 2013, Sagal, a transgender woman, became the target of hate mob Kiwi Farms, an online group New Yorker magazine described as "the web's biggest community of stalkers" that "specializes in harassing people they perceive as being mentally ill or sexually deviant in some way."
> 
> The harassment began after it was revealed a crowdfunding campaign to raise money for Sagal to deal with metal poisoning was actually raising money for her gender surgery.
Friends say Kiwi Farms followers harassed her on a variety of platforms.
> 
> A friend who chose not to give his name, fearing repercussions from Kiwi Farms, said her livelihood and mental stability were destroyed by the attacks.

Portland is home to Lines for Life, a nonprofit devoted to suicide prevention throughout the Pacific Northwest. It operates a suicide prevention line that is answered 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. It can be reached at 800-273-8255 or by texting "273TALK" to 839863.

https://www.oregonlive.com/portland/index.ssf/2018/06/woman_who_set_self_on_fire_in.html

https://twitter.com/search?q=%23chloesagal&src=typd
Tweet:
Chloe Sagal died by suicide in Portland, Oregon (USA) on 19 Jun 2018.

She was 31. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Description:
Daniela died as a result of an illness left untreated because the local hospital refused to admit her.

She was found dead in a residence on 19th June. Agencia Presentes report her cause of death as "social transvesticide".

Name: Nataly Briyith Sánchez
Description:
Nataly was murdered by a client inside her home. Her killer was arrested for the crime.

> Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas (Agencia Vórtice MX).- A young transsexual [woman] in Tuxtla was murdered by her sentimental partner with several stab wounds after an argument out of jealousy inside her home, on 3rd Poniente, between 5th and 6th North, in the Colon neighborhood.
>
> According to the report of the police corporations, it was around 9:00 p.m. on Tuesday, when the officers moved to the house marked with number 680 due to the report of a family fight. Upon arrival, the officers found a young transsexual [woman] lifeless and in a pool of blood, as well as the alleged perpetrator of the crime, who was immediately arrested.
>
> According to information from the Police, the detainee and Nataly Brigitte Sánchez ([deadname] Sánchez, originally from Honduras) had a fight minutes before due to a jealous argument.
>
> It was then that the alleged perpetrator of the crime, a robust and bearded man, stabbed her several times, causing her death.

Nataly was a member of the  Diana Sacayán Civil Association. Her Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/emellyn.sanchezlopez.

> The organization Diana Sacayán, of which Nataly Briyith Sánchez was part, condemned and lamented the crime as well as pointing out that they live in a state that "does not recognize our identity and that discriminates against us. A state that does not provide us with the legal tools to fully access, and according to the parameters of human rights, our rights. "
> 
> They demand from the Attorney General of the State that this crime "be investigated as femicide and the maximum penalty against aggressor be requested." Failure to do so, they add, would be to discriminate against it for reasons of gender identity, "even though the Mexican State has the obligation to recognize the identity of the persons, even if the modifications in the official documents have not been made."

Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Animal Político, 21.06.2018

Name: Thalia Costa Barboza
Description:
Thalia was beaten to death by her partner after he objected to her sharing the fact that they were in a relationship on social media.

Douglas Gluszsazk Rodrigues, 22, was arrested after being identified through CCTV footage and confessed to the crime.

On 21st January 2020 Rodrigues was convicted of her murder and sentenced to 24 years in prison.

> The football player Douglas Gluszszak Rodrigues, will be judged by a Popular Jury tomorrow (21), in São Borja. He is accused of the death of 33-year-old [trans woman] Thalia Costa Barboza on June 20, 2018.
>
> Thalia's body was found by witnesses a day after the crime, on June 21, on the banks of the Uruguay River, in São Borja. According to the police, the victim was beaten to death by Douglas, 22, who played football for the São Borja Sports Association. According to family members, at the time of the crime they had been together for a month. 

Thalia's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/thalia.costa2013.

IBTE & Gauchzh, 21.06.2018

Name: Nikolly Silva
Description:
Nikoly was stoned to death at dawn on Friday 22nd June.

Her body was found in a backstreet behind the Maria Quitéria Municipal School at the intersection of Travessa R and U Street in the Tamoios neighborhood of the municipality of Cabo Frio.

> A [trans woman] was stoned to death in the early hours of this Friday (22), in Unamar, neighborhood of Tamoios, 2nd district of Cabo Frio. The body of the victim, known as Nikolly Silva, was found in a lane at the back of the Maria Quitéria Municipal School.

On 16th September Fabio Barbosa Vianna, 40, was arrested.

> This last Wednesday (16), after investigation, the Civil Police of Cabo Frio arrested the man named as the author of the murder of a [trans woman] and a [cisgender] woman, in addition to trying to shoot dead another [trans woman], Kelly Diamantino, in 2018, in Tamoios, Cabo Frio district.
>
> Fabio Barbosa Vianna, 40, is accused of having stoned the [trans woman] Nikolly Silva in June 2018. In addition to the [trans woman], a woman identified as Nayara Rodrigues was also killed by the suspect at the same time. The crimes took place in Unamar, in the city's second district.
>
> In August, Kelly Diamantino, also a [trans woman], was the victim of an attempted murder, being shot twice in the face, also in the second district. According to the PM, the criminal was arrested in the house where he lived with his parents.

Nikoly's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/nikolly.silva.526.

IBTE & Clique diario, 22.06.2018

https://prensadebabel.com.br/policia-civil-prende-homem-suspeito-de-ser-o-autor-da-morte-de-uma-travesti-em-cabo-frio/

Name: Cathalina Christina James
Description:
Cathalina was found shot dead in the Quality Inn in the Baymeadows area of Jacksonville.

Her shooting was the fourth in Jacksonville in 2018, and the third death after Celine Walker and Antash'a English.

The only information so far concerning a possible suspect in this murder case is that a male was spotted driving a beige vehicle.

> Rest in power and peace Cathalina.   You barely got a chance to enjoy your life before it was taken from you.  Your trans and GNC siblings will not only continue to remind people that your Black trans life mattered, we won't rest until your killer is behind bars.

Name: Katty
Description:
Katty was shot dead in a bar called Guingue located in the neighborhood of Santiago in the municipality of Yautepec.

According to witnesses, her killers burst into the bar at around 8pm, shot her multiple times and then left without saying a word. She died at the scene.

Name: Keisha Wells
Description:
Keisha was found dead with a gunshot wound to the abdomen in the parking lot of an apartment complex.

James Butler, 27, was charged with complicity to aggravated murder.

> She [Keisha] was described as someone who loved her family, loved wearing glamorous clothes and enjoyed decorating her home, her aunt and best friend of four decades previously said.
> 
> Wells was at Cocktails bar the night she was killed. She was found dead with an apparent gunshot wound to the stomach about 7 a.m. Sunday in a parking lot of an apartment building on Detroit Avenue near West 87th Street.
> 
> Eleven bullet casings were found at the scene, according to police reports. Officers also collected a leopard print shoe, a sweatshirt and a wig at the scene.
> 
> She had no identification with her at the time, which caused investigators issues in identifying her, police said.
> 
> After Wells was killed, Butler and the person who killed Wells, who has not yet been identified, took her body from a car and dumped it in the parking lot, according to court records.

According to the Human Rights Campaign Keisha was the second transgender woman to be killed in Cleveland in 2018 (the first was [Phylicia Mitchell](https://tdor.translivesmatter.info/reports/2018/02/23/phylicia-mitchell_cleveland-ohio-usa_04a01540) on 24th February) and the 13th known transgender person to be killed in the USA.

The Advocate and Cleveland, 29.06.2018

https://www.news5cleveland.com/news/local-news/cleveland-metro/keisha-wells-was-gunned-down-sunday-morning-her-killer-is-still-on-the-loose

Name: Dr Laura Masi
Description:
Laura was a doctor specialising in psychiatry and neurology.

She died by suicide. In death her identity was erased by family and she was buried "as a man".

> This is what happens when you don’t have support from your family. Her legal name was Laura and that’s how I will remember her. And people wonder why trans people have such a high rate of suicide.......
> 
> At least we had a ritual for her last night and celebrated her true self. I’m so sorry that they have done this to you Laura.
> 
> I just posted this as a remembrance on the obituary page of the funeral home. Since it has to be approved by the funeral director I'm sure it will never see the light of day.....
> 
> "I never knew "Larry" but I was a friend of Dr. Laura Masi which was her legal name at the time of her death. Laura was a warm, caring, funny, vivacious and spiritual woman. It is a shame that you never got to know the remarkable woman she had become. We held a ceremony for Laura last night honoring her in a way that respected her, her life and her wishes. It is the refusal of people to recognize a trans persons basic human dignity that leads to tragedies such as this unnecessary death. She will be remembered by those of us who knew the real her as a beautiful woman, a shining feminine spirit and a cautionary tale of what happens to a transgender individual who is not accepted by their loved ones."

https://www.instagram.com/p/BlbvtOLAX1_/

https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=2095259024125333&id=100009237674682

https://godfreyfuneralhome.com/tribute/details/1285/Dr-Larry-Masi-Jr/obituary.html#tribute-start

https://www.vitals.com/doctors/Dr_Larry_Masi.html
Tweet:
Dr Laura Masi died by suicide in San Diego, California (USA) on 27 Jun 2018.

In death her identity was erased by family and she was buried "as a man".

She was 40. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Gabrielle Holley ("Gabby")
Description:
Gabrielle died by suicide.

Her Facebook, Twitter and Tumblr profiles are https://www.facebook.com/GabrielleHolleyFL, https://twitter.com/HolleyGabrielle and https://gabrielleholley.tumblr.com. She also had a Youtube channel at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCy2BpmR8fQDYKJGscU9k--w.

> Oh sweetie. I’m so so sorry that this life could not let you find the peace you were looking for.
> 
> May you find it in your next one.
> 
> Until then, be free. And may the warmth of the sun sooth your soul.
> 
> You are loved. And you will be missed.

[Report received by email]
